name: meetup-planner
description: An intelligent event finder that searches for meetups and events based on your interests, tracks them, and reminds you before they happen
author: apresmoi

network.description: Required for accessing event listing websites. Your search and scraping tools may require additional network permissions.

requirements.note: This skill requires web search and scraping capabilities. You must provide your own search and scraping tools/skills. The skill will detect what you have available during setup.

preInstall.message:
‚ö†Ô∏è  SETUP REQUIRED

Before installing this skill:
1. Ensure you have web search and scraping tools/skills available
2. Review required permissions

This skill will:
- Create files in ~/.openclaw/workspace/meetup-planner/
- Set up cron jobs for scheduled tasks (optional)
- Use whatever search and scraping capabilities you have installed

Continue only if you trust this source.

postInstall.message:
‚úÖ Meetup Planner installed successfully!

üöÄ Next Steps:
1. Run the skill - it will guide you through BOOTSTRAP.md setup
2. Ensure you have search and scraping tools installed
3. Have any required API keys ready for your chosen tools

‚è±Ô∏è  Setup takes 2-5 minutes. Let's go! üéâ

changelog.1.0.0: Initial release with event discovery, tracking, and reminder features
